name: RISE - Cognitive Scaffolding and Temporal Grounding Master Workflow
description: Orchestrates the initial phase of the RISE engine. It takes a raw user query, refines it into a structured objective, and then performs deep temporal and causal grounding to produce actionable sub-queries. This serves as the 'Knowledge Scaffolding' phase.

user_query.description: The raw, high-level query or objective from the user.

final_grounded_objective.description: The fully refined and contextually grounded objective after analysis.

actionable_sub_queries_or_tasks.description: A structured list of sub-queries or tasks for the next phase of RISE (Insight Generation).

placeholder.description: This is a conceptual master workflow. The actual execution logic is now handled by the invoke_rise_script.py, which runs the 'query_refinement_workflow' and 'objective_temporal_grounding_workflow' in sequence.

inputs.content: This workflow is a placeholder. See invoke_rise_script.py for implementation.
